text: Rivne Oblast is subdivided into districts (raions) and city municipalities (mis'krada or misto), officially known as territories governed by city councils. In parallel, it is subdivided into amalgamated territorial communities (hromadas). ==Administrative divisions after 2020== Raions of Rivne Oblast as of August 2020. As of July 2020, the number of districts is in the process of being reduced to four. These are: # Dubno (Дубенський район), the center is in the town of Dubno; # Rivne (Рівненський район), the center is in the city of Rivne; # Sarny (Сарненський район), the center is in the town of Sarny; # Varash (Вараський район), the center is in the town of Varash. ==Administrative divisions until 2020== Raions of Rivne Oblast as of June 2020. The city of Rivne is shown in dark blue. In 2020, Rivne Oblast was subdivided into 20 regions: 16 districts (raions) and 4 city municipalities (mis'krada or misto), officially known as territories governed by city councils. *Cities under the oblast's jurisdiction: **Rivne (Рівне), the administrative center of the oblast **Dubno (Дубно) **Ostroh (Острог) **Varash (Вараш), formerly Kuznetzovsk *Districts (raions): **Berezne (Березнівський
